Name: Egg Custard Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: As custardy as the name would suggest but surprisingly potent.
History: Created in 2002 by Alex Kammerling, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Egg Custard Cocktail contains 272 calories
